fileContent: Given I am a current employee
Then I am shown a summary of what I entered
Given I am a current employee
When I enter more time off than I have
Then I am shown an error
And I am shown my pto balance
Given I am an account manager
When I enter the name of an investor
Then I am shown their interests
Given I am an account manager
When I enter the name of an investor
And I enter a new interest for them
Given I am an account manger
When I enter the name of an investor
And I enter a duplicate interest
Then I am shown an error
And the interest is not saved
